If you want to play this game to use the cool killers and their powers to win a lot of games and have fun just... don't.

Since the killers are all a joke to play, the joke of the game cause the game is way, WAY survivor sided.

Like one would expect that the people who made the game that puts 1 dude (with 1 brain) against 4 (With 4 brains, a sh*t-ton of survivor perks and who A LOT of times are on a full party and strategizing and given tactics and callouts on discord (good luck against that) ) at least made all the killers a force to be reckon with, an OP character since you are in literally a game of 4 of them vs 1, you, the player, trying to catch them.

But no, all the killers are underpowered-slow-motion-5000 pounds-sloth simulators.
They are really slow to jump windows, slow to break the obstacles that the survivors throws in front of you all the time, slow to do literally anything.
Also, all your abilities (most killers have only 1 activatable ability) have a 2/3 seconds channel time to activate, even the ones that are throwing axes, powers etc (good luck landing them) so it feels like you are playing with lag or high ping all the time. And if you for some reason manage to catch and attack one of them ALL and I repeat ALL the killers have a 3/4 sec auto stun when you just stand still cleaning the blades, hammer or weapon of choice letting them run far away, very, very far.

That's because it seems that the devs in the development thought that all the killers could be too op for the game ruining it or something like that and as result of that thinking ALL the killers feel as they are in a state like when your favourite champion in a moba gets buffed in one patch, gets op, sees a sh*t-ton ranked play and then gets nerfed into the ground 4 patches in a row to amend that.

I really wanted to like this game. It was such a cool concept, but it's very bad handle, it's really sad.

2/10.

É um jogo em que você apanha muito mais do que prospera, se jogar como sobrevivente. Jogar de assassino é mais divertido, por ser mais fácil. Eles são bem apelões, recebem muito mais vantagens então precisam de muita habilidade pra serem derrotados. Acho que falta um pouco de equilíbrio no poder dos assassinos, por exemplo não permitindo que eles vejam onde estão as alavancas dos portões ou impedindo que fechem o alçapão. Mesmo assim, o jogo é muito interessante pois tem muitas habilidades diferentes pra aprender e formas de evoluir seu personagem. É viciante para jogar sozinho e com os amigos.
Muy entretenido, excelente

E tbm o invisível poderia não ficar invisível enquanto persegue alguém, pois isso é extramente roubado.

ive noticed a sudden spike in facecamping and tunneling killers, probably has something to do with the new skill based match making crap. you get one bad game and die and then you go against a worse killer, same thing happens you go against an even worse killer and the cycle continues. you get hooked, tunneled, or face camped. i have had THIRTEEN games in a row that i have not escaped because every single killer has either a. face camped b. tunneled or c. both, im not going against killers who are on the same skill level as me. im going against people who have no idea what they're doing and therefore just stand there until you die. the game is unplayable and just unfun at this point and i don't know why i keep coming back. i wish behavior would add a penalty to killers who would do this but then again i know all killer mains are looking at this telling me that its not a big deal. okay. when i first started this game i rated it 9/10. that was before the bugs, before anything, before the skill based matchmaking and all this new stuff. now i really cant give this game more then a 3 or 4/10.

Tortilla de patatas con o sin cebolla
Nuestro primer dilema cuando nos enfrentamos a hacer una tortilla de patatas es decidir si la vamos a hacer con cebolla o no. A mi personalmente me gusta mucho más con cebolla, pero conozco muchos casos que literalmente «odian» la cebolla, por lo que en caso de que vayas a hacer tortilla de patatas para un grupo variado, es mejor que preguntes, o, ante la duda, prescindas de la cebolla o utilices cebolla en polvo, porque normalmente es la textura y no el sabor, lo que no suele gustar a los que tienen fobia la cebolla.

Otra alternativa es hacerla añadiendo pimientos verdes, que también le dan un sabor muy especial.

Primer paso: cortar y freír las patatas y la cebolla
Pelamos y lavamos las patatas, las cortamos en rodajas finas al igual que la cebolla. Ponemos ambas cosas en una sartén y cubrimos de aceite de oliva virgen extra, dejamos que se hagan a fuego medio-suave hasta que comiencen a dorarse. Sabréis que las patatas están hechas cuando comiencen a romperse, con la paleta. Para que la tortilla esté jugosa es importante que las patatas se hagan bien y se confiten, porque no hay nada peor que una tortilla con las patatas medio crudas. Por lo tanto, paciencia con este paso.
Segundo paso: mezclar con los huevos
Las sacamos de la sartén y escurrimos bien. Ponemos en un cuenco grande, aparte batimos los huevos y los añadimos a las patatas y a la cebolla, añadimos un poco de sal y mezclamos. Dejamos un par de minutos que se mezclen bien. Aquí hay quien prefiere dejar las patatas enteras y quien prefiere machacarlas un poco con la paleta para que se mezclen bien con el huevo.
Tortilla de patata, trucos

Tercer paso: cuajar la tortilla
Ponemos en la sartén un par de cucharadas de aceite de oliva virgen extra y vertemos todo. Al principio rompemos un poco, como si fuéramos a hacer un revuelto, luego vamos dándole forma por los bordes. Cuando veamos que ya está cuajada por abajo ponemos un plato o una tapa encima de la sartén y le damos la vuelta rápidamente. Ponemos de nuevo la sartén en el fuego y deslizamos la tortilla desde el plato a la sartén. Dejamos unos minutos más (2 o 3 si te gusta más cuajada, menos si te gusta jugosa) para que se termine de hacer y ya tenemos lista nuestra tortilla de patatas.
